title: AU Deals: Round Out Your Week With the Hottest AAA Mega Savings and Absolute Freebies Available!
description: From legendary RPGs to quirky indies, the discounts are deep, and your choices are as overwhelming as they are underpriced.
author: Adam Mathew
byline: The Best Gaming Deals In Australia
excerpt: From legendary RPGs to quirky indies, the discounts are deep, and your choices are as overwhelming as they are underpriced.
text: Thank your own personal deity‚Äîpossibly Mr G.‚Äîit's Friday! Whether you're in the mood for turn-based tactics, open-world adventures, or all-out brawls, my deals list has something for everyone. From legendary RPGs to quirky indies, the discounts are deep, and your choices are as overwhelming as they are underpriced...This Day in Gaming üéÇIn retro news, I'm celebrating the 22nd birthday of Resident Evil Zero, arguably the most why-haven't-they-remade-this entries in the franchise. ‚ÄúS.T.A.R.S.-ing‚Äù Bravo Team member Rebecca Chambers and convict Billy Coen, an unlikely duo riding the rails to one of Umbrella's worst B&Bs, Zero was all about unique protagonist abilities and a hot-swap mechanic. I have fond memories of belting out the Leech Hunter mini-game in the original, not to mention the Wesker Mode injected into the 2016 HD Remaster. html:
Thank your own personal deity‚Äîpossibly Mr G.‚Äîit's Friday! Whether you're in the mood for turn-based tactics, open-world adventures, or all-out brawls, my deals list has something for everyone. From legendary RPGs to quirky indies, the discounts are deep, and your choices are as overwhelming as they are underpriced...

This Day in Gaming üéÇ

In retro news, I'm celebrating the 22nd birthday of Resident Evil Zero, arguably the most why-haven't-they-remade-this entries in the franchise. ‚ÄúS.T.A.R.S.-ing‚Äù Bravo Team member Rebecca Chambers and convict Billy Coen, an unlikely duo riding the rails to one of Umbrella's worst B&Bs, Zero was all about unique protagonist abilities and a hot-swap mechanic. I have fond memories of belting out the Leech Hunter mini-game in the original, not to mention the Wesker Mode injected into the 2016 HD Remaster. I'd kill to see this on the RE Engine.

Aussie bdays for notable games

- Pac-Man World (PS) 2000. Redux

- Top Gear Rally 2 (N64) 2000. eBay

- Resident Evil Zero (GC) 2003. Redux

- Impossible Creatures (PC) 2003. Get

- Racing Evoluzione (XB) 2003. eBay

- Hearts of Iron (PC) 2003. Sequel

- Praetorians (PC) 2003. eBay

- Real Racing 3 (iOS) 2013. Get

- Night in the Woods (PC,PS4) 2017. Get

Contents

  • Nintendo
  • PC
  • Xbox
  • PlayStation
  • LEGO

Nice Savings for Nintendo Switch

Starting the deals strong on the Nintendo Switch, Mario + Rabbids Kingdom Battle is a ridiculous mashup that almost didn‚Äôt happen (Miyamoto himself had to approve Ubisoft‚Äôs out-there-as-hell idea of strapping Mario with blasters). Also, The Outer Worlds delivers witty space-faring adventure from the folks who gave us Fallout: New Vegas, complete with a satirical take on corporate-controlled planets that I simply adored.

Mario + Rabbids Kingdom Battle

You‚Äôre in for a surprise: even for XCOM vets some of these battles are challenging puzzles. Some of the tougher levels do devolve into a trial-and-error slog, but a good mix of enemies, objectives, and character abilities keep things interesting.

  • The Outer Worlds (-51%) - A$22
  • Rayman Legends Def. Ed. (-80%) - A$12
  • God Eater 3 (-35%) - A$55
  • Caf√© Enchant√© (-38%) - A$47

Back to top

Purchase Cheap for PC

Meanwhile on PC, it‚Äôs freebie paradise (if you make a Prime Gaming account). The cult classic Deus Ex: Human Revolution is yours for nothing, featuring cyberpunk conspiracies and one of gaming‚Äôs best ‚Äúpunch through walls‚Äù mechanics. Meanwhile, Mages of Mystralia‚Äîalso free!‚Äîboasts a magic system so flexible, even its developers had to ban certain spell combos for being too OP.

Star Wars Outlaws

A clever syndicate system brings real weight to almost every task you choose, some of which conjure up some genuinely stunning blindsides. Having a pal like Nix at your side adds an enhanced set of useful abilities too.

  • Mages of Mystralia (-100%) - FREE w/Prime
  • Deus Ex: Human Revolution (-100%) - FREE w/Prime
  • Sine Mora Ex (-100%) - FREE w/Prime
  • Yes, Your Grace (-100%) - FREE w/Prime
  • Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora (-67%) - A$33
  • Prince of Persia The Lost Crown (-50%) - A$30

Exciting Bargains for Xbox

You Xbox Series X faithful can dive into the timeless masterpiece The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt and experience the game that made Henry Cavill geek out enough to land a Netflix role. If you prefer (admittedly imperfect) over-the-top chaos, Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League lets you unleash mayhem in Metropolis with a surprising Batman: Arkham universe connection.

Witcher 3 Complete Ed.

It's basically one of the best RPGs of all time improved in many ways. Oh, and all of the DLC, which were meaty enough to have been sold as standalone content in their own right.

  • Suicide Squad Del. Ed. (-58%) - A$69

  • Overcooked! All You Can Eat (-47%) - A$30

Pure Scores for PlayStation

Finally, for PlayStation 5, God of War Ragnar√∂k packs an emotional punch‚ÄîChristopher Judge‚Äôs powerful performance as Kratos even won him the longest Game Awards speech in history. And if swinging through New York is more your speed, Spidey: Miles Morales offers wintertime web-slinging and a jazz-infused soundtrack that‚Äôs as stylish as its hero.

God of War Ragnar√∂k

An enthralling spectacle to behold and an even more exciting one to take the reins of, God of War Ragnarok melds action and adventure together to create a new, unforgettable Norse saga.
